Name: Oil Change
Description: Routine oil and filter change for the vehicle.

Name: Brake Service
Description: Inspection and replacement of brake pads and rotors.

Name: Full Service
Description: Complete inspection and service including fluids, brakes, and engine check.

Name: Transmission Service
Description: Replacement of transmission fluid and inspection of transmission components.

Name: Suspension Check
Description: Inspection and maintenance of vehicle suspension system.

Name: Funeral Service
Description: A traditional service that includes a formal ceremony for the deceased.

Name: Cremation Service
Description: Service related to the cremation of the deceased.

Name: Graveside Service
Description: A brief service held at the gravesite before burial.

Name: Memorial Service
Description: A service to remember the deceased, usually held after the burial or cremation.

Name: Viewing Service
Description: A service where family and friends can view the deceased prior to the funeral.

Name: Transportation Service
Description: Transportation of the deceased or attendees to and from the funeral event.

Name: Embalming Service
Description: Preparation and preservation of the deceased body for viewing.

Name: Grief Counseling
Description: Support and counseling services for grieving family members.
